duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage construction projects for the maintenance or building of Hybrid Fiber Coaxial (HFC) in residential areas.
Ensure the quality of work meets established technical standards and company policies.
Work in varied environments, both in the field and the office.
Coordinate resources, calculate the cost of materials, and ensure customer connectivity to communication services.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, valid driver’s license with satisfactory driving record
